articles.description: In an interview, the chair of the Federal Trade Commission laid out some of her plans now that she has a Democratic majority at the agency.
articles.content: I think weve seen time and time again that when you have a company that has captured control over a key artery of commerce, that control can be used unlawfully. That was partly what animated the pass… [+2329 chars]
